trans-unit.source: About Azure Virtual Machines
trans-unit.target: About Azure Virtual Machines

trans-unit.source: Learn about the basics of virtual machines in Azure.
trans-unit.target: Learn about the basics of virtual machines in Azure.

trans-unit.source: Azure Virtual Machines is one of several types of on-demand, scalable computing resources that Azure offers.
trans-unit.target: Azure Virtual Machines is one of several types of on-demand, scalable computing resources that Azure offers.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you'll choose a virtual machine instead of another option if you need more control over the computing environment than the other choices offer.
trans-unit.target: Typically, you'll choose a virtual machine instead of another option if you need more control over the computing environment than the other choices offer.

trans-unit.source: Another approach is to use a virtual machine on your own hardware.
trans-unit.target: Another approach is to use a virtual machine on your own hardware.

trans-unit.source: Compared to that approach, an Azure virtual machine gives you the flexibility of virtualization without having to buy and maintain the physical hardware that runs the virtual machine.
trans-unit.target: Compared to that approach, an Azure virtual machine gives you the flexibility of virtualization without having to buy and maintain the physical hardware that runs the virtual machine.

trans-unit.source: However, you do still need to maintain the virtual machine -- configuring, patching, and maintaining the operating system and any other software that runs on the virtual machine.
trans-unit.target: However, you do still need to maintain the virtual machine -- configuring, patching, and maintaining the operating system and any other software that runs on the virtual machine.

trans-unit.source: This table helps you compare the choices offered by Azure.
trans-unit.target: This table helps you compare the choices offered by Azure.

trans-unit.source: Try out a virtual machine by creating a simple virtual machine quickly.
trans-unit.target: Try out a virtual machine by creating a simple virtual machine quickly.

trans-unit.source: For instructions, see one of these tutorials:
trans-unit.target: For instructions, see one of these tutorials:

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Create a virtual machine running Linux</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Create a virtual machine running Linux</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Create a virtual machine running Windows in the Azure preview portal</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Create a virtual machine running Windows in the Azure preview portal</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: Because those tutorials help you create a virtual machine quickly, they show you only one way to do it instead of describing the various tools you can use to create virtual machines.
trans-unit.target: Because those tutorials help you create a virtual machine quickly, they show you only one way to do it instead of describing the various tools you can use to create virtual machines.

trans-unit.source: For a summary of these tools and links to instructions, see:
trans-unit.target: For a summary of these tools and links to instructions, see:

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Different ways to create a Linux virtual machine</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Different ways to create a Linux virtual machine</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Different ways to create a Windows virtual machine</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Different ways to create a Windows virtual machine</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: If you're just starting to learn about Azure virtual machines, be sure to also check out the <linkText>Frequently asked questions</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: If you're just starting to learn about Azure virtual machines, be sure to also check out the <linkText>Frequently asked questions</linkText><title></title>.
